"Josia ba Jehoiakim: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Kegyina EWURADZE fie abanguado
Judahen no: na Juda nkurow nyinara a wɔba bɔsɔr EWURADZE fie no
n’ahendzi ahyɛse no: ka nsɛm a mehyɛ wo dɛ ka kyerɛ hɔn no nyinara kyerɛ hɔn; mma mmfa asɛm biara nnsuma ekyir."

"Josia ba Jehoiakim: "Annyɛ a wobetsie
Judahen no: na hɔn mu nyimpa biara adan efi n’akwan bɔn no mu; ma meenu moho wɔ mbusu a mesua me tsirmu dɛ medze mobɔbɔ hɔn wɔ hɔn ndzeyɛɛ bɔn ntsi no ho."

"Josia ba Jehoiakim: "Na ka kyerɛ hɔn dɛ
Judahen no: Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Sɛ hom enntsie me
n’ahendzi ahyɛse no: dɛ hom bedzi me mbra a medze esi m’enyim no do
dɛ: "dɛ hom betsie mo nkowaa nkɔnhyɛfo a mosoma hɔn hom nkyɛn a
, #2 Ahe 23.36—24.6; 2 Mbe 36.5-7": mosoɛr ahema mpo na mosoma hɔn
column8: na hom enntsie me nsɛm a;"

"Josia ba Jehoiakim: "ɔnodze mebɛyɛ ofi yi dɛ Siloh
Judahen no: na mayɛ kurow yi ndom ama asaase do amanaman nyina."

"Josia ba Jehoiakim: "Na asɔfo na nkɔnhyɛfo na ɔman no nyina tsee dɛ Jeremia reka nsɛm yi wɔ EWURADZE fie."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ Jeremia wiee dza EWURADZE hyɛɛ no dɛ ɔnka nkyerɛ ɔman na asɔfo no
n’ahendzi ahyɛse no: na ɔman no nyina suoo no mu

"Josia ba Jehoiakim: "Ebɛn ntsi na edze EWURADZE dzin ahyɛ nkɔm
n’ahendzi ahyɛse no: Ofi yi bɛyɛ dɛ Siloh na kurow yi ayɛ ekurofo a obi nntsena do? Na ɔman no nyinara behyiaa Jeremia nkyɛn wɔ EWURADZE fie."

"Josia ba Jehoiakim: "Na Juda mbapɔmba tsee ndzɛmba yinom no
Judahen no: wofii ahemfie fowee baa EWURADZE fie ɔponkɛse fofor no ano."

"Josia ba Jehoiakim: "Nna asɔfo no na nkɔnhyɛfo no kasaa kyerɛɛ mbapɔmba na ɔman no nyina
n’ahendzi ahyɛse no: Ɔbarimba yi sɛ owu; osiandɛ ɔahyɛ nkɔm etsia kurow yi
na asɛm yi fii EWURADZE nkyɛn bae: dɛ mbrɛ hom aso atse yi."

"Josia ba Jehoiakim: "Nna Jeremia kasaa kyerɛɛ mbapɔmba nyinara na ɔman no nyinara
n’ahendzi ahyɛse no: EWURADZE na ɔsomaa me dɛ membɛhyɛ asɛm a hom atse yi nyina ho nkɔm ntsia ofi yi na kurow yi."

"Josia ba Jehoiakim: "Dɛm ntsi afei hom nyeyɛ hom akwan na hom nyɛe yie
Judahen no: na hom ntsie EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ne ndze; na EWURADZE bonu noho wɔ mbusu a ɔaka etsia hom no ho."

"Josia ba Jehoiakim: "Na emi dze
n’ahendzi ahyɛse no: mowɔ hom nsamu; hom nyɛ me dɛ mbrɛ oye na ɔtsen wɔ hom enyi do."

"Josia ba Jehoiakim: "Ohu ara na hom nhu no ampa dɛ
n’ahendzi ahyɛse no: hom dze bɔgya a odzi bem bɛba homankasa
dɛ: na no mu atsefo nyina do: na nokwar mu ara
, #2 Ahe 23.36—24.6; 2 Mbe 36.5-7": EWURADZE na ɔasoma me hom nkyɛn dɛ membɛka nsɛm yi nyina wɔ hom asomu."

"Josia ba Jehoiakim: "Nna mbapɔmba na ɔman no nyina kaa kyerɛɛ asɔfo na nkɔnhyɛfo no dɛ: Ɔbarimba yi nnsɛ wu; osiandɛ EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn dzin mu na ɔakasa akyerɛ hɛn."
"Na binom fi asaase no do mpanyimfo no mu soɛree na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ ɔman baguafo no
na asɛm yi fii EWURADZE nkyɛn bae: "Moresɛtnyi Mikaia hyɛɛ nkɔm wɔ Judahen Hezekia ne nda mu; na ɔkaa kyerɛɛ Judaman no nyina dɛ
dɛ: Mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi: Wobofuntum Zion dɛ mfuwa
, #2 Ahe 23.36—24.6; 2 Mbe 36.5-7": na Jerusalɛm adan ekurofo na ofi no ne bepɔw no ayɛ dɛ kwaa mu nsorɔnsorɔmbea."

"Josia ba Jehoiakim: "Aso Judahen Hezekia na Judafo nyina kum no? Ana nnyɛ EWURADZE na osuroo no
Judahen no: na ɔdze nkotoserɛ bisaa EWURADZE n’enyimpa
n’ahendzi ahyɛse no: na EWURADZE so nuu noho wɔ mbusu a ɔkae tsiaa hɔn no ho. Dɛm na yɛdze bɔbɔ mbusu kɛse etsia hɛnankasa hɛn akra."

"Josia ba Jehoiakim: "Na ɔbarimba bi so wɔ hɔ a ɔhyɛɛ nkɔm wɔ EWURADZE dzin mu
Judahen no: Semaia a ofi Kiriat-jearim no ne ba Uria; na ɔhyɛɛ nkɔm tsiaa kurow yi na asaase yi
n’ahendzi ahyɛse no: dɛ mbrɛ Jeremia ne nsɛm nyina tse:"

"Josia ba Jehoiakim: "na ɔhen Jehoiakim
dɛ: ɔhen no hwehwɛɛ dɛ oku no; na Uria tsee no

"Josia ba Jehoiakim: "na ɔhen Jehoiakim somaa mbarimba bi kɔr Egypt
n’ahendzi ahyɛse no: na mbarimba bi wɔka no ho kɔr Egypt:"

"Josia ba Jehoiakim: "na wɔkɛfaa Uria fii Egypt
Judahen no: na wɔdze no brɛɛ ɔhen Jehoiakim; ɔno na ɔdze afona kum no
n’ahendzi ahyɛse no: na ɔtoow no fun kyeen amansuon esiei."

"Josia ba Jehoiakim: "Na Safan ba Ahikam ne nsa wɔ Jeremia afa
Judahen no: dɛ mma wonnyi no nnhyɛ ɔman no nsa mma wonnku no."
